dct_title_s: Outline Map of The British Cameroons
dct_description_sm: Map shows: international and provincial boundaries, province and divisional headquarters. Area administered as Cameroons Province, area administered by the Resident of Bornu and Resident of Yola provinces. This map shows The Cameroons under the British administration were divided by a strech of approximately 45 miles into north and south by the Benue River. "1686.3897.a1260/240.750.6.24" Original map is filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, a map reproduction is attached to companion volume.
